title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Industrial Electronics; Fundamentals of Analog Signal conditioning; Operational Amplifiers; Voltage-to-Current and Current-to-Voltage Converters, A/D and D/A Converters; Fundamentals of Power conditioning; SCRs, Triacs, IGBT and other Thyristerised devices and their Industrial Applications; Introduction to Digital Electronics, Fundamentals of Microprocessors and Interfacing, Data Acquisition Systems; Introduction to Lasers, Optical Fibres and other Optoelectronic Devices; Introduction to Industrial Communication; Serial and Parallel Communication Principles LAN/WAN standards, Optical and Wireless Networking.
